Text:
Thank you for Windows 7 x86 (32 bit).

One thing I don't understand, in the image screen provided it says "no updates," but in the text above it says updates installed until Feb 12.  Does the "no updates" mean "no updates needed"?

Sorry, some clarity then.
I installed this using audit mode, which you can switch to during install.
I then downloaded all the windows updates, installed .net 4.5, directx updates, etc.
Then I ran sysprep /generalize, which removes all my hardware specific stuff and Administrator username stuff from the registry.

I then rebooted to my other partition and deleted the left-over user/administrator files.
I then captured the image using imagex for use in the install dvd. I exported the original image to a different file, and re-mounted the image to add the OEM-branding stuff. I then exported the newly added OEM-image under a different name, to the existing one I just copied, so it now has both.

It's a little complicated, but basically it has all the updates up to the Feb12 patch date.
